item.title: Group Anagrams
item.description: Question Given an array of strings strs, group the anagrams together. You can return the answer in any order. An Anagram is a word or phrase formed by rearranging the letters of a different word or phrase, typically using all the original letters exactly once. Examples Input: strs = [“eat”,“tea”,“tan”,“ate”,“nat”,“bat”] Output: [[“bat”],[“nat”,“tan”],[“ate”,“eat”,“tea”]] Input: strs = [""] Output: [[""]] Input: strs = [“a”] Output: [[“a”]] Constraints 1 <= strs.length <= 104 0 <= strs[i].
